_header: He crieth and weepeth straight I-bound
_description: The infant Christ in the manger — two couplets in a Latin sermon

CULIi38.Transcription:
He cryth & wepyth streyt .i bowodein clowtys and cloþys
                    wrappyd & wowudehis lemys & lendys boþe forte &
                    hondehis modyr bydith hym with swathul bonde
CULIi38.Editions:
Erb,  Peter C. 
             “Vernacular Material for Preaching in MS Camb. Univ. Lib.
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         33 (1971): 63-84: 73.
